name: Colorful and childish admin.ch
description:
Discover the admin.ch site in a colorful and childish universe. No more boring and serious site, fun and humor style are waiting for you. 
A background that puts glitter in your eyes, a fun typography and a colorful interface to make you laugh or dream.
additional_info: For this style you need to download the Google font: "Nanum Pen Script".
